output: El nu sta chei en cheste moment.

Possession is shown with possessive adjects that decline for person and for the number and gender of the thing possess. For example, 'my book' is 'mè leiber',  'your dog' is either 'çu chan' (2nd person singular) or 'voster chan' (2nd person plural); 'their house' is 'lûr chase'. Note that this last one does not inflect for gender!

Negation is shown by adding the negative adverb 'nû' before the conjugated verb. For example, 'I don't know' is 'Io nû sai'. For more complex negation, a second adverb can be added after the conjugated verb. For example, 'I don't know anymore' is 'Io nû sai phlus'. Notice that the first person conjugation of this verb is irregular!
